summary: This document contains a certificate of limited liability company resolutions for JEGE LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts for the company. It lists authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke, and outlines the powers granted to them regarding the management of the company's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for JEGE LLC, granting him powers to manage the company's accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is also listed as an authorized signer for JEGE LLC, alongside Jeffrey Epstein, with similar powers regarding the company's accounts.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for JEGE LLC, indicating a close working relationship in managing the company's financial affairs.

keyFacts: The document certifies the LLC resolutions for JEGE LLC, allowing Deutsche Bank to manage its accounts.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are named as authorized signers for the company.
The document outlines the powers granted to the authorized signers regarding account management.
The resolutions state that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
The document confirms that no one other than the company has any interest in the accounts opened in the company's name.
